origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CryptoAPI.get_recent_analysis', 'description': 'This function provides recent analysis reports on a specific cryptocurrency based on the analysis type and time frame.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'cryptoName', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the cryptocurrency to analyze.'}, {'name': 'analysisType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of analysis to perform, e.g., financial_interoperability, market_trends.'}, {'name': 'timeFrame', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time frame for the analysis, e.g., last_three_months, last_year.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'The analysis report for the specified cryptocurrency and analysis type within the given time frame.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CryptoAPI.get_recent_analysis, 它的参数输入如下: 'cryptoName'是'Avalanche', 'analysisType'是'financial_interoperability', 'timeFrame'是'last_three_months'.
